nodes.text: Chandrilan cigarras were a type of cigarra that shared their name with the Core Worlds planet Chandrila. They could be ignited and smoked for recreation by humans. In 40 BBY, while serving as the lord regent of the Inner Rim planet Pijal, Jedi Knight Rael Averross enjoyed smoking a Chandrilan cigarra as he spoke to the Pijali Princess Fanry in the Pijali palace.
Chandrilan cigarras first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel by Claudia Gray.
